Edges-Disciple -- Female Finnar Human Heroic Adventurer
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d10 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d8 Strength: d8 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Cold Blooded: -2 Vigor (cold weather effects)
Disciple Of Hothar: +2 vs. mind effects
Disciple Of Kenaz: +2 Vigor (resist heat)
Disciple Of Thunor: +1 Vigor (resist hot and cold), suffers half falling damage
Skills (28 Points):
Boating: (agi) d6 Intimidation: (spi) d8 Stealth: (agi) d8
Climbing: (str) d6+2 Investigation: (sma) d8+2 Streetwise: (sma) d8+2
Faith: (spi) d8 Lockpicking: (agi) d6+2 Survival: (sma) d6
Fighting: (agi) d10 Notice: (sma) d8+2 Swimming: (agi) d6
Gambling: (sma) d8 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Taunt: (sma) d8+1
Healing: (sma) d6+2 Shooting: (agi) d8 Tracking: (sma) d6
Skill Notes:
Alertness: +2 Notice
Disciple Of Eira: +2 Healing/5 companions +2 natural Healing
Disciple Of Hoenir: +1 Common Knowledge/+1 all Knowledge/May make untrained Knowledge rolls
Disciple Of The Unknowable One: +1 Taunt/+1 vs. Taunt
Investigator: +2 Investigation/+2 Streetwise/+2 Notice (sifting for information)
Thief: +2 Climbing/+2 Lockpicking/+2 Notice (traps)/+1 Repair (traps)/+2 Stealth (urban)
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: +1 Faith (vegetated areas)
Disciple Of Ertha: +2 Survival (underground)
Disciple Of Hela: +1 Faith (graveyards)
Disciple Of Nauthiz: May reroll 1s on Gambling, Stealth, and Lockpicking; suffers fatigue for 1 dy if reroll is 1
Disciple Of Sigel: +2 Notice (detect hidden objects and creatures)
Disciple Of Ullr: +2 Stealth (wilderness)/+2 Tracking (wilderness)
Scholar: +2 on 2 chosen skills
Size: 0 Deity: Var
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 30 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Skill: 16
Description Notes: Diverse: +2 Improvement Points (edge or skills)
Features
Edges (0 points): Alertness; Arcane Background (Miracles); Beast Bond; Disciple Of Dargar; Disciple Of Eira; Disciple Of Eostre Animalmother; Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother; Disciple Of Ertha; Disciple Of Freo; Disciple Of Hela; Disciple Of Hoenir; Disciple Of Hothar; Disciple Of Kenaz; Disciple Of Maera; Disciple Of Nauthiz; Disciple Of Neorthe; Disciple Of Niht; Disciple Of Rigr; Disciple Of Scaetha; Disciple Of Sigel; Disciple Of The Norns; Disciple Of The Unknowable One; Disciple Of Thrym; Disciple Of Thunor; Disciple Of Tiw; Disciple Of Ullr; Disciple Of Vali; Disciple Of Var; Investigator; Marksman; Scholar; Thief Hindrances: Cautious; Cold Blooded; Stubborn; Vow Finnar Human Features: Diverse
Feature Notes:
Arcane Background (Miracles): Violating core beliefs inflicts -2 Faith for 1 wk; major sins remove powers
Beast Bond: May spend Bennies on companion animals
Beast Master: Has animal companion; other animals will not attack first
Cautious: Requires detailed plan before acting
Connections: May call in favors from acquaintance or organization
Disciple Of Eostre Animalmother: Has Beast Master feature with wild card companion animal
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: May use Champion and Holy Warrior edges with plant creatures
Disciple Of Neorthe: Survives on half water; survives drowning for 8 rd
Disciple Of Niht: No penalty in dim and dark illumination, -2 in pitch dark
Disciple Of Rigr: Needs only 3 hrs sleep, suffers half penalty for missed sleep, counts as active guard when asleep
Disciple Of Sigel: Halves illumination penalty vs. heat-producing foes
Disciple Of Tiw: +1 Rank for acquiring combat edges
Disciple Of Vali: Immune to disease and poison
Disciple Of Var: May sell goods at 50% price (Raise 75%)
Orders: Takes orders from outside power
Stubborn: Never admits error
Vow: Has broad restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 9 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 9 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Scale Hauberk Shield: Large Shield Weapons: Long Bow: 1 (2d6 R15"); Short Sword: 1 (d8+d6); Sling: 1 (d8+d4 R4"); Unarmed: 1 (d8+d0)
Combat Notes:
Disciple Of Ertha: +1 Toughness
Fighting Parry Modifier: +5 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Disciple Of Dargar: Single blow that incapacitates foe makes adjacent foes Shaken (Spirit neg)
Disciple Of Eostre Plantmother: Moves normally through vegetated difficult terrain
Disciple Of Freo: Treats all terrain as normal ground
Disciple Of Kenaz: +4 Armor vs. heat damage, may magically heat metal weapon for +2 damage vs. cold resistant and +4 vs cold immune
Disciple Of Scaetha: +2 damage vs. undead
Disciple Of Sigel: +2 vs. invisible foes
Disciple Of The Unknowable One: +1 on Tricks/+1 vs. Tricks
Disciple Of Ullr: May move half Pace before using Marksman with bow
Marksman: Trade move for +2 ranged attack
Arcana
Power Count: 2 Power Points: 10
Powers:
Burrow: (3 PP) RSelf Allows merging into earth for 3 rd
Burst: (2 PP) R9" Cone inflicts 2d10 damage (Agility neg)
Havoc: (2 PP) R20" Distracts and throws creatures in 2" radius 2d6" (Strength neg)
Refuge: (3 PP) R10" Creates 10'x6' shelter that gives +2 Vigor vs. cold (Raise +4) for 12 hr
Voice On The Wind: (2 PP) RSelf Transmits 30-word message up to 500 miles to known target
Wilderness Step: (1 PP) RTouch Target treats all terrain as normal while maintained
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Miracles): 2 Powers/10 Power Points
Disciple Of Hela: Dbl Raise on Zombie creates permanent undead
Disciple Of Maera: May cast off-list spell at -2, +2 Dispel
Disciple Of Scaetha: +1 casting vs. undead
Disciple Of The Norns: May spend benny for augury
Disciple Of Thrym: More effective casting in cold environment
Disciple Of Tiw: May cast and attack in single action
